text: And it came to pass, as he talked with him, that <FI>the king<Fi> said unto him, Have we made thee of the kingÂ’s counsel? forbear; why shouldest thou be smitten? Then the prophet forbare, and said, I know that God hath determined to destroy thee, because thou hast done this, and hast not hearkened unto my counsel.
